## isJsonObject() function

Test if an `unknown` is potentially a [JsonObject](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isJsonObject(from: unknown): from is JsonObject;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

from is [JsonObject](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md)

`true` if the supplied parameter is a non-array, non-special object with no symbol keys, `false` otherwise.
